pullRequest.title: KAFKA-9599 create unique sensor to record group rebalance
pullRequest.bodyText:
the "offset deletion" and "group rebalance" should not be recorded by the same sensor since they are totally different.
the code is introduced by #7276
jira link: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/KAFKA-9599
Committer Checklist (excluded from commit message)

 Verify design and implementation
 Verify test coverage and CI build status
 Verify documentation (including upgrade notes)

nodes.bodyText: What about calling it CompletedRebalances to stay inline with OffsetDeletions?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -74,7 +74,7 @@ class GroupCoordinator(val brokerId: Int,
       "group-coordinator-metrics",
       "The total number of administrative deleted offsets")))
 
-  val groupCompletedRebalanceSensor = metrics.sensor("OffsetDeletions")
+  val groupCompletedRebalanceSensor = metrics.sensor("group-rebalance")

commit.message: KAFKA-9599 create unique sensor to record group rebalance

afterCommit.message: KAFKA-9599 create unique sensor to record group rebalance
